multi_department_case_1.title: Executive Financial Misconduct and Harassment Investigation
multi_department_case_1.description: Complex case involving multiple allegations against a senior executive including financial irregularities, sexual harassment, and security policy violations requiring coordination across HR, Legal, and Security departments.

allegations.description: Inappropriate sexual advances and creating hostile work environment for female subordinates. Requires HR investigation and potential legal action.
Misappropriation of company funds through fraudulent expense claims totaling $150,000. Requires Legal review for potential criminal charges.
Unauthorized access to confidential systems and sharing sensitive client data. Requires Corporate Security investigation.

multi_department_case_2.title: Data Breach and Employee Misconduct Investigation
multi_department_case_2.description: Investigation of potential insider threat involving unauthorized data access, policy violations, and potential regulatory compliance issues requiring multi-department coordination.

allegations.description: Employee accessed and potentially exfiltrated confidential customer data. Requires immediate Legal review for regulatory compliance and breach notification requirements.
Multiple violations of company IT policy including using personal devices for work and bypassing security controls. Requires HR disciplinary action.
Used administrative credentials to access systems outside scope of role. Requires Corporate Security investigation to assess system compromise.

multi_department_case_3.title: Vendor Fraud and Conflict of Interest Investigation
multi_department_case_3.description: Investigation of employee's undisclosed relationship with vendor leading to fraudulent contracts, requiring legal, HR, and security review.

allegations.description: Employee failed to disclose personal relationship with vendor and approved inflated contracts. Requires HR investigation for policy compliance.
Fraudulent vendor contracts resulting in $500,000 overpayment. Requires Legal review for recovery action and potential criminal referral.
Altered vendor evaluation documents to justify contract approvals. Requires Security investigation to assess document integrity controls.

hr_focused_case.title: Workplace Discrimination and Retaliation
hr_focused_case.description: HR-focused case involving discrimination and retaliation claims that may require legal consultation.

allegations.description: Manager making discriminatory comments based on race and gender, affecting multiple employees.
Manager retaliating against employees who reported discriminatory behavior by giving poor performance reviews.

legal_focused_case.title: Regulatory Compliance Violation and Money Laundering
legal_focused_case.description: Legal-focused case involving potential regulatory violations that may require coordinated investigation.

allegations.description: Failure to report suspicious transactions as required by anti-money laundering regulations, potentially exposing firm to regulatory penalties.
Employee assisted client in structuring transactions to avoid reporting requirements, potential criminal activity requiring investigation.

security_focused_case.title: Cyber Security Incident and Insider Threat
security_focused_case.description: Security-focused case involving potential cyber security breach and insider threat requiring investigation.

allegations.description: Employee's credentials used to access systems outside normal working hours and download sensitive files to external devices.
Behavioral indicators suggesting employee may be planning to steal intellectual property before leaving the company.
